Class DesConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sabre.sws.des.configuration.DesConfiguration

  • @Component
public class DesConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Class reading REST and SOAP config.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DesConfiguration()
      Initializes configuration objects with values read from the properties files.
